Articles.Content:
I am trying to complete the contract that wants you to test poodle engine. I ran the test on kerbin somehow. But I just cant run test on orbital fligth and altitudes from 80000 to 90000. pressing run test doesnt do anything 
nevermind... I got it

You have to be in an orbit, at 85000m altitude.

Edited March 16, 2017 by BlitzMater

The button won't do anything if your ship is not in the right orbit. If you can post a screenshot of your ship's orbit, while you have the contract app open at the same time, showing the correct contract -- that would be a big help in letting us know why it isn't working for you.
